author: Staff Reporter
text:
‘Suvidha’ superfast special trains between Chennai Central and Ernakulam Junction will be operated to clear traffic.

Train No. 00645 will leave Central at 10.30 p.m. on Feb. 12 and reach Ernakulam at 10.50 a.m. Train No.00646 will leave Ernakulam Jn. at 7 p.m. on Feb. 14 and reach Chennai at 7.15 a.m.
title: Special trains
